bug.author: Blakjak88
bug.description: I installed ensmallen using vcpkg but discovered that the "upgraded" version is quite out of date. vcpkg installs 2.11.2 Latest version is 2.14.2 I found this problem as I could not get my code to compile with EarlyStopAtMinLoss using a callback function. When I checked the header file there was no callback function constructor. I manually changed the version number in my vcpkg CONTROL file but should this not be taken care of automatically with every new release?
